alert.note: Alert for Atchison; Holt (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 6:44PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Atchison and northeastern Holt Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 644 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mound City, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mound City and Maitland. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 82 and 90. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
